_comment: Test fixture for patch version bump on main branch. Tests incrementing the patch version (e.g., v0.1.0 â†’ v0.1.1). This scenario is documented in VERSIONING.md under 'Releasing Minor and Patch Versions'. Git state required: Existing tag v0.1.0 on main branch, main branch checked out. Expected outcome: Workflow should calculate new version as v0.1.1, validate version is greater than current, trigger release workflow. Setup: Run 'setup-test-git-state.ps1 -Scenario PatchBump' before testing.
